Function set_logger¶

  • Defined in File PyLogging.h

Function Documentation¶

PyObject *set_logger(PyObject *self, PyObject *args)¶

Sets the logger to the inputted object.

Parameters
  • self: required for python objects
  • args: the logger to link for error outputting
